document_title: Stevens Johnson syndrome (SJS): Causes, signs, treatment
subsection_content: Death is the most serious complication in cases of Stevens-Johnson syndrome. Statistics in 2016 in Italy showed that the mortality rate due to SJS was 16.9%; due to TEN is 29.4%. In 2021, in Japan, the mortality rate is 13.6% with TEN. It is worth mentioning that these two countries both have advanced medical and resuscitation systems in the world. In addition, other complications include: sepsis, anaphylactic shock, multiple organ failure, pneumonia...(3)
subsection_data:
hoi chung stevens johnson.json. Symptoms
Death is the most serious complication in cases of Stevens-Johnson syndrome. Statistics in 2016 in Italy showed that the mortality rate due to SJS was 16.9%; due to TEN is 29.4%. In 2021, in Japan, the mortality rate is 13.6% with TEN. It is worth mentioning that these two countries both have advanced medical and resuscitation systems in the world. In addition, other complications include: sepsis, anaphylactic shock, multiple organ failure, pneumonia...(3)
